ComicInfo.Summary: Life and death is an eternal cycle. And to become a super human, Josh Carver (or what's left of his humanity) had to die to reborn as Revere, his super human alter ego. But everything has a price, and FX7 price seems to be too high. The transformation went terribly wrong and Josh lost almost every inch of skin, leaving a super powered mass of human flesh. At the national presentation of the newest member of the Front Line, Carrick Masterson tried to hide this horrible truth from the media, but a terrorist attack unveiled the peeled face of Revere to the shocked world. What will be the consequences? What's the future of Josh Carver?
